name: A Sketchy Quest
description:
When a stick figure sketch falls out of his notebook, he must journey through the notebook's dropped pages to get back home again!

Created for the GDEX Game Jam 2022.

Controls:

Arrow keys move, shift jumps, and ctrl attacks when you have an eraser. Jumping and holding down with an eraser will let you bounce extra high! Holding up while equipped with an eraser will let you hit things above you.

F2 will restart the entire app, alt+f4 quits

SOME SOUND EFFECTS BY:

Dizzy Cow
